content.html: According to @TwitterSupport this isn’t misgendering me. It blatantly is. I’ve routinely reported (and had success doing so) misgendering against others, but when I report for myself, you let me down. Cheers for enabling abuse. Really appreciate it.
content.value:
According to @TwitterSupport this isn’t misgendering me. It blatantly is. I’ve routinely reported (and had success doing so) misgendering against others, but when I report for myself, you let me down.

Cheers for enabling abuse. Really appreciate it.

photo.alt:
Screenshot from a reply from Cariad2 KPSS:

“If you are a transwoman then you are
a male who wishes to be seen as a
woman.
You may be using women's toilets &
women's changing rooms but if
people (either female customers or
the management of the premises) told
you you weren't allowed to, they
would be within their rights.”
